price: Ṣé ó ń lérò pé ẹnì kan kò ní agbára lórí òun ni?
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabu an lan yaqdira ʿalayhi aḥadun
